image_analysis.description: A scanned image of four pages from a legal deposition transcript. The pages are numbered 97, 98, 99, and 100. Each page is formatted in two columns, with timestamps and line numbers on the left side of each column and the transcribed dialogue on the right.

01:48:51   1         Another thing that I had, and I will not

01:48:56   3   confidential information, but on December 30th, I
